overview: 'Seventeen Days in The Crucilble' marks the 25th anniversary of the Dubliner Ken Doherty becoming world champion in 1997. It's now been a quarter of a century since the Ranelagh native held off dominant champion Stephen Hendry in a gripping final that was one of the most-watched sporting events involving an Irish person of the 1990s.
title: Seventeen days in the Crucible
